_sText:
thank you for downloading my map =)
_________________________________________________________
instructions for the instalation of the map:

-extract the folder "gg_fortress" in: 
C: \ Program Files \ Steam \ SteamApps \ "your account name" \ counter-strike source \ cstrike \ materials.

-extract "gg_fortress.bsp" and "gg_fortress.nav" in: 
C: \ Program Files \ Steam \ SteamApps \ "your account name" \ counter-strike source \ cstrike \ maps.

_________________________________________________________
there can be 60 players on this map (30 terrorist and 30 counter-terrorist)
but this map is optimized for a maximum of 30 players.
_________________________________________________________
thank you to the Awah-team and all the beta testers.
_________________________________________________________

map by romii750xix
_________________________________________________________

if you find a bug, please contact me

if you have a problem contact me here:
romimap@live.fr
